name: Insane Screaming Mayhem (Zeedar)
description:
This game was made for the 2017 Global Game Jam, and won Best Tech prize at the Glasgow site.

You control a small green blob and dodge the obstacles by shouting into the microphone. The louder you shout, the higher he goes. The game uses volume, not pitch. Make sure you adjust your microphone settings to best suit your experience and if possible use a microphone far from the PC and lower your speaker volume, as the game sounds might interfere with your voice.

Although the game can be finished alone, you might want to get the help of your friends, to scream together, so you don't run out of breath.

Enjoy!

Install instructions

Just unpack and play, 16:9 resolution is advised.
